title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Real-Time Online Voting for University Education Improvement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can improve class participation rates by ≥20% using three or more real-time online polling tools (Mentimeter, Slido, Google Forms).
Applying action research methodology, learners analyze polling results and concretize educational improvement plans in three phases.
Feedback based on voting data can achieve a learner needs incorporation rate of over 70% in lesson design.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
